name: Dice-hell
description:
Description 

In this game, you will try to make combo and hit the boss (who constantly shoots at you).

 The rarer the combo, the more damage you deal.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Combos

1,1,1 - 5 dmg 1,1,1,1 - 8 dmg 1,1,1,1,1 - 10 dmg 2,2,2 - 1 heal 2,2,2,2 - 2 heal 2,2,2,2,2 - 4 heal 1,1,1,2,2 - 5 dmg & 1 heal 1,1,2,2,2 - 8 dmg & 2 heal 2,2,2,3,3 - 20 dmg 3,3,3,3,3 - ULTIMATE (50 dmg)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Mouse  :/ 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sorry, I didn't have time to make the tutorial, so I did it in a hurry and in paint

If you manage to assemble an ultimate attack, tell me about it in the comments

Have a nice game  ; )
